ValidationRule.description: Opportunities won can only move to cancelled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), NOT(ISPICKVAL (StageName, "Cancelled")), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Won"), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Users_Exclusion,$User.Username)), RecordTypeId == $CustomMetadata.Constant__mdt.FinleapConnectStandardSales_RecordTypeId.value__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Closed Won Opportunity can only be cancelled. Please also enter a reason for the loss of the opportunity.
